skill.name: agent.skills.GetDecontaminated
skill.description: For the agent, to move toward a decontamination site and ask for decontamination. In case of many units asking for decontamination, the agent queues for decontamination. To decontaminate, the decontamination site has to be operated by specific units.

link.name: moveToward
link.description: To enact the decision of moving toward the decontamination plot.
